title: Week 1 NFL DFS Picks & Advice (Football 9/10)
description:
There's some uncertainty surrounding season-long fantasy football this season with a chance for NFL DFS to be more popular than ever. Regardless if you're a veteran of the space or just a beginner, you have to listen to advice from our fantasy guru Heath Cummings before setting your lineups. Heath and host Will Brinson go through every game on the Sunday slate, offering tips to help towards the perfect build.
Dolphins-Patriots (6:30)
Eagles-Washington (13:00)
Jets-Bills (17:15)
Packers-Vikings (22:00)
Bears-Lions (23:30)
Seahawks-Falcons (31:00)
Browns-Ravens (37:30)
Raiders-Panthers (40:15)
Colts-Jaguars (43:15)
Saints-Bucs (46:00)
Chargers-Bengals (50:15)
Cardinals-49ers (51:45)
Cowboys-Rams (54:30)
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @heathcummingssr
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices

content:encoded:
There's some uncertainty surrounding season-long fantasy football this season with a chance for NFL DFS to be more popular than ever. Regardless if you're a veteran of the space or just a beginner, you have to listen to advice from our fantasy guru Heath Cummings before setting your lineups. Heath and host Will Brinson go through every game on the Sunday slate, offering tips to help towards the perfect build.

Dolphins-Patriots (6:30)

Eagles-Washington (13:00)

Jets-Bills (17:15)
